articles.author: Compiled by Herman Mostert
articles.title: Cricket SA board grants extension on submission of Ombudsman's SJN report
articles.description: Cricket South Africa's board on Wednesday granted the Social Justice and Nation-building Ombudsman an extension on the final submission of the report.
articles.content:
Cricket South Africa's board on Wednesday granted the Social Justice and Nation-building (SJN) Ombudsman an extension on the final submission of the report.

articles.author: Khanyiso Tshwaku
articles.title: Cricket SA's acting chief executive says SJN report will be made public
articles.description: Cricket South Africa's acting chief executive officer Pholetsi Moseki said the contents of the Cricket for Social Justice and Nation-building report will be made public.
articles.content:
• Cricket South Africa's acting chief executive officer Pholetsi Moseki says the Cricket for Social Justice and Nation-building report will be made public.

articles.title: PCB hands Umar Akmal three-year ban from all cricket | ESPNcricinfo.com

articles.content: Umar Akmal's troubled cricket career has hit its biggest roadblock yet, with the PCB handing him a ban from all representative cricket for three years after he pleaded guilty of failing to report det… [+1506 chars]

articles.title: What we learned from watching the 1992 World Cup final in full again | ESPNcricinfo.com
articles.description: Wides, lbw calls, swing - plenty of things were different in white-ball cricket back then | ESPNcricinfo.com
articles.content: Last week, we at ESPNcricinfo did something we have been thinking of doing for eight years now: pretend-live ball-by-ball commentary for a classic cricket match. We knew the result, yes, but we tried… [+6823 chars]
